Title: The communes are big and the backbone is strong, it is easy to set up a unified system of allocation of available labor power, foster numerous troops of activists that are both red and expert to build up socialism
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: Poster nr. 6 from the series "People's communes are good" (Renmin gongshe hao, 人民公社好).This poster has been cut in four and recycled for printing texts. The printed text shimmers through the very thin paper.
